net.brabenetz.lib.securedproperties.core

Class Encryption

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.brabenetz.lib.securedproperties.core.Encryption

  • public final class Encryption
extends Object
    Some Utilities about encryptions.

    • Method Detail

      • isAlgorithmSupported

        public static boolean isAlgorithmSupported(Algorithm algorithm)
        Checks if the given Algorithm can be used to encrypt String-Values.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - The Algorithm to check.
        Returns:
        true if the Algorithm is supported.

      • getFirstSupportedAlgorithm

        public static Algorithm getFirstSupportedAlgorithm(Algorithm... algorithms)
                                            throws IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        algorithms - a list of Algorithm to check
        Returns:
        the first Algorithm which can be used for encryption, see isAlgorithmSupported(Algorithm).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no Algorithm is supported.

      • createKey

        public static SecretKey createKey(Algorithm algorithm)
        generate a SecretKey with the given Algorithm and wraps checked Exceptions into RuntimeExceptions.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - the Algorithm to use for generated the SecretKey
        Returns:
        the generated SecretKey.

        See Also:

      • toBase64String

        public static String toBase64String(SecretKey secretKey)
        transform a SecretKey to a Base64 encoded String.

      • isEncryptedValue

        public static boolean isEncryptedValue(String mybeEncryptedValue)
        Checks if the given String looks like an encrypted value.

      • encrypt

        public static String encrypt(Algorithm algorithm,
                             SecretKey secretKey,
                             int saltLength,
                             String plainTextValue)
        Encrypt the given plain-text value with the given SecretKey and the given Algorithm.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - The Algorithm to use for the encryption.
        secretKey - The SecretKey to use for the encryption.
        plainTextValue - The value which should be encrypted.
        Returns:
        the encrypted value.

      • decrypt

        public static String decrypt(Algorithm algorithm,
                             SecretKey secretKey,
                             int saltLength,
                             String encryptedValue)
        Decrypt the given encrypted value with the given SecretKey and the given Algorithm.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - The Algorithm to use for the decryption.
        secretKey - The SecretKey to use for the decryption.
        encryptedValue - the encrypted value to decrypt.
        Returns:
        the decrypted value.
